org.apache.giraph.aggregators

类 BasicAggregator<A extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.giraph.aggregators.BasicAggregator<A>
  • 类型参数:
    A - Aggregated value
    所有已实现的接口:
    Aggregator<A>
    直接已知子类:
    BooleanAndAggregator, BooleanOrAggregator, BooleanOverwriteAggregator, DoubleMaxAggregator, DoubleMinAggregator, DoubleOverwriteAggregator, DoubleProductAggregator, DoubleSumAggregator, FloatMaxAggregator, FloatMinAggregator, FloatOverwriteAggregator, FloatProductAggregator, FloatSumAggregator, IntMaxAggregator, IntMinAggregator, IntOverwriteAggregator, IntProductAggregator, IntSumAggregator, LongMaxAggregator, LongMinAggregator, LongOverwriteAggregator, LongProductAggregator, LongSumAggregator, TextAppendAggregator

    public abstract class BasicAggregator<A extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>
extends Object
implements Aggregator<A>
    Abstract class for Aggregator. Implements get value, set value and reset methods and has internal value object.

    • 构造器概要

      构造器和说明

      Default constructor.

    • 方法概要

      方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      A getAggregatedValue()
      Return current aggregated value.
      void reset()
      Reset the value of aggregator to neutral value

      Set aggregated value.

    • 构造器详细资料

      • BasicAggregator

        public BasicAggregator()
        Default constructor. Creates new value object and resets the aggregator

    • 方法详细资料

      • getAggregatedValue

        public A getAggregatedValue()
        从接口复制的说明: Aggregator
        Return current aggregated value. Needs to be initialized if aggregate or setAggregatedValue have not been called before.
        指定者:
        getAggregatedValue 在接口中 Aggregator<A extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>
        返回:
        Aggregated

      • setAggregatedValue

        public void setAggregatedValue(A value)
        从接口复制的说明: Aggregator
        Set aggregated value. Can be used for initialization or reset.
        指定者:
        setAggregatedValue 在接口中 Aggregator<A extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>
        参数:
        value - Value to be set.

      • reset

        public void reset()
        从接口复制的说明: Aggregator
        Reset the value of aggregator to neutral value
        指定者:
        reset 在接口中 Aggregator<A extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>
